Are you using the default parameters for rpict/rtrace? Have you tried setting the -dr parameter greater than 2? If you post the command you are using to calculate the reflections, it may be easier to comment. I suspect it will be more complicated than the -dr setting, but that's a start.


>  I have been unsuccessful, so far, to generate  more than two reflections.
